title: I KNEW IT WOULD WORK AND IT DOES

embed.description: Instant Gaming (PC Games -70%) - http://www.instant-gaming.com/igr/Vandiril/ Send me your replays here: vandiril88@gmail.com Follow me on Twitch, Facebook and Twitter: http://www.twitch.tv/vandiril https://www.facebook.com/Vandiril https://twitter.com/vandiril If you want to support me even more, you can donate here :) http://bit.ly/1tJNpmL

body: Ryze ult rework is the best thing Riot has ever done.

replies.body: See now were going to have those nice Nunu Jungle Ryze mid fuck bot lane squads running rampant lmao.
You can also port Zyra plants, armies of minions, Heimer's turrets, a lot of misc stuff, and best of all.. Teemo Shrooms.

> [{quoted}](name=ReshiKillim,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZWT3dQNP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-30T14:47:25.137+0000)
>
> You can also port Zyra plants, armies of minions, Heimer's turrets, a lot of misc stuff, and best of all.. Teemo Shrooms.

I can see it now. Teemo placing all of his shrooms in one fairy circle of satanism somewhere near bot lane. Then Ryze and Nunu Come to the circle and invite Teemo down to bot lane. The bot lane prepares for their team to initiate the goon fiesta, whilst you, the other unsuspecting bot lane, mindlessly farms to your hearts content confident in your lane.

 Then all of a sudden, All chat appears. The red text of teemo saying "Size doesn't mean everything" as the bright blue circle of fuck you appears behind your adc. You know whats happening, your adc knows whats happening, you both know there's no escape. "An Ally has been Slain appears" is heard, as the enemy team converges on you. You pray for a swift demise. As your team mates see you were mindlessly slaughtered /all chat appears. "GG noob bot lane."
This was beatiful. Thank you!
The range for Ryze's ult isn't that large tbh. I think it's 1500 at rank 1 and 3000 at rank 2.
its large enough....look at these videos and whats its capable of.
yas's Q?
His W...
His W is Windwall
Exactly. The other guy was stating champions that either dodged, blocked or slowed auto attacks (sorry malphite)

>whats a basic attack?

Jax's entire kit?

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=SiWiW3cji8A

I fucking love this ult.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZWT3dQNP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-30T15:07:21.662+0000)
>
> https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=SiWiW3cji8A
> 
> I fucking love this ult.

Wait I thought Repertoir said that wouldn't work because Sion gets an invisible "unstoppable" buff that prevents him from getting CCed while ulting (like Vi, Malphite, and Hecarim) that would prevent this interaction.
That's definitely true of Malphite and Vi. Sion doesn't use it I guess. I'm kinda fine with this. Will probably consult a few other designers to see what they think.

I really hope they allow this to stay. There are too few abilities (I can't think of any actually) that synergize with Sion's ult before he lands it. 

And it looks really awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZWT3dQNP,comment-id=0005000000030000,timestamp=2016-06-30T19:53:20.366+0000)
>
> I really hope they allow this to stay. There are too few abilities (I can't think of any actually) that synergize with Sion's ult before he lands it. 
> 
> And it looks really awesome.

And it adds a whole new level of skill and coordination to pull off crazy chases. I think it would make for some interesting gameplay
What happens if its one for all and two ryzes (ryzei?) ult the same spot in different directions?
It only takes your team with yours and their team with theirs probably.
In **one for all** meaning they are on the same team
You essentially destroy the space-time continuum.

> [{quoted}](name=Aeszarck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZWT3dQNP,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-06-30T15:58:41.254+0000)
>
> Wait I thought Repertoir said that wouldn't work because Sion got an invisible "unstoppable" buff that prevents him from getting CCed while ulting (like Vi, Malphite, and Hecarim) that would prevent this interaction.

That's what i'd think. Kinda like how Tahm can't eat a channeling/recalling ally, you'd think they'd be immune from ryze's ult as well. In that case, i wanna see skarner pull the enemy into a hole of F**K YOU EAT FOUTAIN
THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU PISS OFF AN ARCHEMAGE!!!

I don't know man. It looks like it is working. 

If it's a bug, I hope they keep it.
yes he did say it wouldnt and shouldnt work.
Now thats thinking with portals
Call this by it's name. It's known as the 'Yeti Bomb'
Looks like the new Ryze ult just went from "meh" to "deliciously evil".
Hey look people will play nunu now {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

in the PBE stream they said you cant transport tentacles because tentacles are not targetable by your teammates

EDIT: lmao changed testicles to tentacles......my bad
...what.
Are you sure you worded that correctly?

lol thanks ...i fixed it.....i see what happened.........my keyboard is old and sometimes even when i press a key it wont type the letter. And i just go back and right click the misspelled words and click on the right word. And in this case testicles was the 1st word in the list and i just clicked it without realizing.
Who the hell needs an ADC?!
So Ryze will be a perma ban after the update. Sorry Ryze mains ; ;
if you seriously sit five people in a bush for long enough for Ryze to drop a nunu bomb on you, you deserve it...
exactly...after seeing this vid this shit is fuckin broken......if im banning i will ban him every game unless my team gets 1st pick and someone wants to use him.

The video doesn't show it well, but there's a very clear indicator showing where Ryze will land. The team playing against the Ryze was set up specifically to be blown up by the combo, it wasn't random. Combine that with the fact that it is very clear that Nunu has built AP and basic logic and you will know to move out of the way.

Is it interrupting the channel at the destination, or was it just timed so perfectly that Nunu's ult went off right when they arrived?

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
It doesn't interrupt channels.
Good luck finding a team that won't move away when they see the indicator.

Two words for you:  Objective control.

The other team is doing baron, they see the indicator.  Either they move away and concede the objective to you (and possibly just run away from a bluffing Ryze) or they stay there and risk being hit by fully charged Nunu+galio ults.
WE WARPING NUKES STARCRAFT STYLE.
you can actually teleport enemy champions when you get a {{champion:72}}  or {{champion:6}} mid ult.

Confirmed

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XmBoPg2YRu8&feature=share
so it's basically a portal that says "this portion of the battlefield is here now"?
i was thinking sion 's ult but  this is great too and i hope they dont nerf it
